#vue-cli

$ npm install -g vue-cli
$ vue init webpack my-project
$ cd my-project
$ npm install
$ npm run dev

收藏js
2018-05-12

收藏一些比较常用的js 在此备份分享…

# 网页动态背景——随鼠标变换的动态线条canvas-nest.js
<script src="//cdn.bootcss.com/canvas-nest.js/1.0.1/canvas-nest.min.js"></script>

#网页动态背景——随鼠标变换的动态线条canvas-nest.js

insert the code below between <body> and </body>.

<script src="//cdn.bootcss.com/canvas-nest.js/1.0.1/canvas-nest.min.js"></script>
